summary: Unit tests that verify the object detection evaluation logic, constructing class maps, generating synthetic ground‑truth and predicted label sets, and asserting that computed metrics (e.g., precision, recall, mAP) are correct under normal and edge‑case conditions such as absent ground truth or predictions.
business_intent: Provide automated validation of the object detection evaluation module to guarantee accurate performance reporting for geospatial AI models, supporting quality control and confidence in downstream decision‑making.
